group_1.textLeft: Here's our next stop, the beach house!

group_1.textRight: Aww, the octopus on the sign is so cute!

group_1.textCenter: This restaurant is under the management of a@famous drummer.
He’s said to be a master of his craft, to the point@where during his performances,
Witnesses remark on how it looks like he's@playing with many arms.
That's why he chose an octopus as a motif for@his restaurant.

group_1.textRight: Wow!

group_1.textLeft: His fans come here like it’s some kind of holy@pilgrimage.
I totally get it, though.
If there's a place associated with someone you@admire, you'd want to visit it as much as possible!

group_1.textRight: I wouldn't understand.
To me, the person I admire is more important@than any location.

group_1.textLeft: Grr...
This beach house has a great atmosphere!@We could use it for filming!

group_1.textRight: Yeah.
I wanted to find out more about the mermaid@legend,
But there's not much else to see around those@rocks.
I think we might learn more if we ask the people@in here.
There's a problem, though.
This place is so famous that it'll be hard to get@permission to film something here.

group_1.textLeft: Well, it wouldn't hurt to ask.
Maybe their policy is, like, you can't record anything inside the restaurant,
But they should allow us to do it outside.

group_1.textRight: I guess that would work.

group_1.textLeft: But... there seems to be some kind of commotion@over there...?

group_1.textRight: You didn’t find him?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I got nothing... maybe he's gone for good.

group_1.textRight: Umm...?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, sorry, we're in the middle of something.
We won’t be able to fulfill your order anytime soon.

group_1.textRight: Is something wrong?

group_1.textLeft: No, it's just... our mascot escaped.
We've been looking for him, but no luck.

group_1.textRight: What exactly is your mascot?

group_1.textLeft: He's an octopus we keep here at the shop.@His name’s Hachi.
An... octopus...?

group_1.textRight: Well, considering the ocean is right at your@doorstep,
Maybe he decided to get up and go home.

group_1.textLeft: Jeez, Kirari, don’t just blab out the first thing@that comes to mind! Think before you speak!

group_1.textRight: You sounded like her big sister just then, Rena...

group_1.textLeft: D-don't tease me like that!

group_1.textCenter: Hey, everyone, you mind if I take the floor for@a sec?

group_1.textLeft: What's up?

group_1.textRight: You know, maybe if we work together, we can@catch Hachi.
If we can find him, maybe they'll allow us to film@our movie here!
And it'd be great if we could find Hachi for his@own sake, too!

group_1.textLeft: Alright, I'll go negotiate with the store owner@about getting permission to film.

group_1.textRight: Oh no, don't do that!
This is something where we have to act with the@purest of intentions in order to win him over.
Once he's falling over himself with gratitude,@wondering what he could possibly do to thank us,
That’s when we hit him with our little request.

group_1.textLeft: Man, you really are a snake...

group_1.textRight: Well, if you’ve got any better ideas, I’m all ears.

group_1.textLeft: ...Alright, fine.
...I'll go tell the owner we want to help him find@that octopus.
I'll ask about what Hachi looks like so we can all@find him together.

group_1.textRight: No, I think we should go look for him separately.

group_1.textLeft: Why?

group_1.textRight: Because it'd be a waste of time if we all looked@in the same place.

group_1.textLeft: Hm... fair point. Alright, we'll split up and comb@the area.

group_1.textRight: Even that won’t be necessary. I'll find him shortly.

group_1.textLeft: Well, aren’t you full of yourself―

group_1.textRight: Rena...

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:120901:lipSynch_1:motion_0:eyeClose_1]*Sigh* I know, I know...
...Anyway. I’m gonna get that description of Hachi,@and then we’ll split up and go on the hunt.
